attributes.action: To block the use of the 'Freedom of Information Act' to cover up MPs allowances and expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mps must not be allowed to ignore the Freedom of Information act to cover up the amount received in Allowances and Expenses.
This is public money and must be accounted for. Open Government means Open Government this must include full public declaration of MPs Allowances and Expenses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
